About ( help index )
What is eSQLManager?

A graphical database management application which primarily focusses on managing the MySQL database server. As of version 1.0 eSQLManager offers support for MS SQLServer, PostgreSQL and Oracle.

There are two different versions of eSQLManager available:

- the Light Edition, a free version of eSQLManager with all the basic functionalities needed for maintaining a database server
- the Professional Edition, this version contains all features provided in the Light Edition but offers many more functionalities e.a.: import / export of table data and structures, database usermanagement and many more.

More information about eSQLManager is available on our website: http://www.errorsoft.nl
